transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan, madam boliye.
Customer: Haan, mai apna screen share kar rahi hu madam, thik hai. Aapko screen toh dikh rahi hai na meri?
Executive: Haan, haan dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Dikh rahi hai na madam mera screen? Haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Thik hai madam. Isme aap bol rahe ho ki maine mojdi ka dala hai uski list nahi aaya, right?
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Dekhiye madam aapne sab cheez aapne fix kiya hai lekin ye jo aapne ye group hai na, dekhiye sab mein aapne silk saree update karke rakha hai isme printed saree isme aapne nahi dala, thik hai. Lekin isme kya hai aapko
group banana hoga, thik hai. Jaise mai aapke behalf pe create kar de rahi hu, thik hai.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Thik hai, mojdi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yahi bol rahe hai na madam? Haan, haan.
Executive: Ladies moment kar lete hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Haan madam.
Executive: Ab dekhiye madam ye add hua. Ye madam kya rehta hai na ki agar aap ye nahi daloge toh koi bhi buyer ko ye dikhega hi nahi ki ye aapke product mein add hai, thik hai. Ab aap haan ab aap kal se check kijiyega aapko mojdi ka bhi aane lagega jaise ki aapko ye sarees vagera ka aa rahi hai na?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan madam.
Executive: Haan, vaise hi aapko mojdi ka bhi aane lagega jaise maine abhi aapka add kiya, thik hai. Aap mujhe madam isme bata do, isme bata do ye aur silk ki saree hai sir, haan silk ki saree hai.
Customer: Kya silk ki saree hai?
Customer: Haan. Maine dekhiye yaha pe add kar diya.
Customer: Haan madam.
Executive: Thik hai, ye bata dijiye madam.
Customer: Oh saree silk nahi hai.
Customer: Silk nahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay. Aur silk material ki saree aa rahi hai madam aapko buyleads vagera? Haan usme toh aa rahi hai ke mojdi ki nahi aa rahi thi.
Executive: Achha mojdi ki nahi aa rahi thi. Toh madam isme maine update kar diya hai, thik hai. Aapne bahut achha maintain karke rakha hai dekhiye aapka sab cheez full hai, thik hai. Aapne name bhi dala hai aapne photos bhi dala hai haan bas aapne group nahi dala tha wo maine fix kar diya hai, thik hai. Aur madam price bhi sahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Haan madam.
Executive: Achha. Aur koi concern madam leads inquiry se related? Nahi nahi madam aur kuch nahi hai yahi tha ek.
Executive: Achha thik hai madam.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's mojdi listing was not appearing.



Resolution:

- Executive created a group for mojdi.
- Executive updated silk saree details.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- listing, mojdi, group, update
